Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory286.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Alright. Sample collected.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Without the protective gear, I'm sure we'd be infected if we got any closer... What a creepy thing.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Though sealed in the airtight container, the sample is still attempting to flow toward the Red Tide as if it is alive. It also continues to produce small Hetero-Creatures.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "As if it's trying to get back to its mother. Is it alive...?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Asimov indeed believes that the Red Tide is a form of biologically evolved Punishing Virus.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Looks like the Hetero-Creatures are by-products of the Red Tide, but further studies will need to be conducted in order to understand their source and how they are formed.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Wanshi isn't falling asleep for once. That's rare.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "...Old habits die hard. But that's irrelevant now.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Wanshi looks back at the Red Tide. It has slowed down and formed a decent-sized lake in the lower grounds of the city.'}
{3: 'The sunlight shimmers on the quiet crimson liquid that swallows life and death wherever it goes...'}
{3: 'Then Wanshi hears the whispers in the Red Tide.'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "What's wrong, Wanshi? You look terrible.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Don't you hear that?", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'The creatures are talking in the Red Tide... No, they sound more like... data fragments?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "It's meaningless. Don't let it distract you.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Even so, an eerie silence still envelops them. The whispers in the Red Tide flood into their ears and wraps around them like a perpetual shadow.'}
{3: 'It is not until the vibration and rumbling in the distance break the silence that the three wake up from the trance and look for the source of the commotion.'}
{3: 'The hissing of the Hetero-Creatures and the sound of the greatsword slashing echo above the empty city.'}
{3: 'Mixed with familiar angry roars.'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "Let's find out.", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory287.png'}

{3: "They arrive just in time to see Camu fling a sticky Hetero-Creature off his greatsword with disgust. The creature splats on the wall behind Chrome then slowly slides down. Its mucus splashes onto the hem of Chrome's pants."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Camu! It really is you! Are you okay?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: "I'm immune to it, but you might not be. Don't come closer if you don't have to.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Camu lifts a finger to point at the Hetero-Creature remnants and "blood" all over his body.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Nah. A part of our mission is to collect Red Tide samples, so we all put on full protective gear before we landed. Don't worry about us!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: "I didn't say I was worried.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Wanshi', 3: "His fighting style is as insane as Kamui's...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "I don't fight like that...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Camu puts the greatsword on his back and kicks the pile of Hetero-Creature limbs away, then walks toward the Strike Hawks. Kamui finally gets a good look at all the filth on Camu.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: "So what's the situation? What are you all doing here?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'We received a direct order from President Hassen to look for the Gray Ravens. They...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "Lost all contact, right? The guy with a disgusting smile told me the same thing and gave me a few possible coordinates. I've sifted through them, however...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Camu takes out the screen and pulls up the map.'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "The closest coordinates are underground. I circled around this area but I didn't find an entrance.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "There's an underground shelter below the city. I'm sure there are more than one entrances. If only we can find the blueprint of the underground facilities...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'Pointless.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'All the possible entrances have been blocked off.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Camu points at the Red Tide puddles on the ground.'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'Unless you want to dive underwater to open the door?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: '...That might be a little challenging.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'It feels like someone is intentionally trying to stop us. Where does the Red Tide come from? Is it sentient or is someone manipulating it?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: 'Hmph. Every time I tried to get closer to those coordinates, these disgusting things would swarm at me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "Other squads are also looking for Huaxu. Their protective gear isn't as strong as ours, so they might not be able to get past the Red Tide.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "If we can't find a way to go underground, we should at least ensure the safety of our ground support.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Kamui, you work with Camu. Continue to look for the Gray Ravens.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Wanshi and I will connect with the other squads. We need to sync our information and make sure that there is enough support to handle any situation.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "(We'll leave Huaxu to you, Gray Raven. I have faith in you.)", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Whatever we do... we need to hurry.', 4: '1'}
